name: Shapes (itch) (OkrimGames)
description:
Take a classic arena shooter, remove de ability to shoot, give the player a rotating shield to defend yourself from enemys of geometric forms and there you have it, welcome to shapes.

Five different game modes twist the game base concepet in very different ways:

-Arcade

This is the main mode, you, your shield and infinite enemies.Changing the rotation of the shield, you'll change his color too, and you'll be able to destroy only the enemies that match the shield color.

-Pitfall

Huge holes have opened in the field, don't fall in them to avoid instant death, the good news is that the enemy can fall too.

-LightsOff

Darkness has come, and it has obscured all.

Follow the lights to see the enemy.

-Monochrome

In this variation of the arcade mode, all the enemies are colored the same.

Making your job easier.

-OnRails

You are bound to follow the rails and can move only on their path.

Survive the rockets that come from every direction.

Different Skins will let you change the enemy appearance, and every color is also customizable, from the enemy to the player.
